comments:
Integration Build 2004/03/09

I compare workspace resource with one in another branch. After merging of
necessary modifications I save modified resource and press OK in Team Refresh
Complete dialog. Actually no changes are saved, no CVS decoration in package
explorer appears. Then I try to update resource in plugin perspective and save
it. Saving is OK, decoration appears. Then I restore file replacing it with
version from CVS, try to do the first operation (compare resource with one in
another branch) once again. Now I get Team Refresh Complete dialog with message
"No new changes found". If I open editor with this file, it still don't see any
changes. 
Sounds messy, but this is exactly what I have.

In my error log I see a bunch of messages:

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 53579 ***
